titles.title: To direct the United States Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code for Windsor Heights, Iowa.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia.

committee.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform

committee.subcommittee: Federal Workforce, Post Office, and the District of Columbia
committee.name: House Oversight and Government Reform

bill.summary: 1/29/2008--Introduced. Directs the U.S. Postal Service to designate a single, unique ZIP Code that encompasses the entire city of Windsor Heights, Iowa.
